title: Perfect Location, Pets Welcome, Patio or Balcony, WD
posting_body: The Berkeley is conveniently located in northwest Denver with quick access to the RTD G-line, the Highlands, Sloan's Lake, downtown Denver and I-70.
Our apartment community is situated across the street from Willis Case Golf Course and just a few blocks east of Regis University.
This location offers rare, community feel in an urban location at competitive prices.
While close to downtown, The Berkeley is situated in a residential neighborhood, just blocks from parks and dining.
This two bedroom one bathroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, entry and linen closets, and a washer/dryer!
The Berkeley is conveniently located in northwest Denver with quick access to the RTD G-line, the Highlands, Sloan's Lake, downtown Denver, and I-70.
Great in-unit and onsite amenities, our community offers quick access to everyday essentials, recreation, and entertainment.
The Berkeley , managed by BLDG Management
* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More
Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.
Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.
